titleStmt.title: The wanton wife of Bath. To the tune of, Flying fame, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for W.O. and sold by the booksellers of Pye corner and London-bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "In Bath a wanton wife did dwell ..."
In four columns with the title and woodcut above the first two; the columns are not separated by rules.
Item at A6:1[526] imperfect: columns three and four, including imprint, wanting.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
